about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the world of "Nevermind," through the art that started it all. Creative Director Erin Reynolds reflects on the journey of Nevermind's creation with concept art, in-game images, and stories from behind the scenes.

Chapters Include:

  • Mood Pieces
  • The Neurostalgia Institute
  • IntroSim
  • Client #251
  • Client #418
  • Miscellany

51 Pages
PDF

To Access "The Art of Nevermind," Please Follow the Steps Below:
1 - Right click "Nevermind" in your Steam Library and select "Properties."
2 - Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files.”
3 - Within Nevermind's local files, find the folder titled "artbook."
4 - The art book's PDF file can be found within that folder.
